title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper. Creamy and rich, it's perfect for a quick and comforting meal.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Tender chicken chunks marinated in yogurt and spices, then simmered in a creamy, spiced tomato sauce. A popular dish in Indian cuisine.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish featuring a mix of colorful vegetables stir-fried with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce. Perfect over rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa. Easy to make and great for a casual meal with friends or family.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade cookies with gooey chocolate chips and a hint of vanilla. Crispy on the edges and chewy in the middleâ€”always a crowd-pleaser.
